content.detailedDescription: I took a couple of pictures and asked people around to confirm what i witnessing. i have a small camera with me everywhere i go. when i took the pictures ,at first did not notice the disc shape object on the top and when i came home and magnified the picture on my computer then i noticed it ! i do not think that anyone noticed/saw it either. this was in bright daylight at about 11:50am and i had just left my physician's office. the white light was not moving for the first few minutes and then started to move and stopped again then all of a sudden it was gone!
content.summary: Leaving my physisian's office after my annual check up, i noticed the light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in a recliner watching tv and i spotted this red light outside the front window of my mother's home. both objects were bright red spheres hovering about 60 degrees. i viewed them between the large trees in the yard and it seems they were only a few hundred feet off the ground.  the spheres hovered in the same area during the time i watched them. one sphere hovered over the other. i thought it might have been a reflection of something in the livingroom but nothing in that bright color was in the room.  after about an hour it travelled southwest and as it travelled i would see a white light on the object as well as the red.
there was no sound.

on may 1st it appeared again only slightly further away. it hovered in the same area for at least an hour. i could see the white light shine the one hovering lower than the other would travel slightly horizontally in each direction. 

i didn't see the objects on the may 2nd, but may 3rd and 4th they appreard again.  they were farther away but the same direction and the lights had a strobing effect. 

the nights have been overcast and the red lights were very bright.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 red spheres appreared in southwest sky as i looked out my motheres front window

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend smokes alot, thats bad but its good for me because she goes out smokes and watches the sky. i got her looking up and she saw it  with me a few times here at my house so she knows what it looks like. she called me outside and i saw it lower than usual, bright white going pretty slow. i ran in and got my camera ran back out.I filmed it for a few seconds icouldnt hold it steady enough ,so i ran to a pole to lean against but by then it was going behind some trees so i backed up and filmed it again.It went behind somemore trees.I just filled out a sighting just 3 hrs ago that we saw on 4 26 11 i just said i was going to film it,camera was charged up and ready.Ive have seen this object at least 30 times. it does right turn angles, it hovers no blinking light, and it shuts it light off.I saw this hover in one spot above my house shut its light off. i new it stopped by a group of stars so i new where it last was. i keep watching that spot i saw it light up dark orange without moving,i saw nothing for 10 min then it lit up dark orange, wasnt moving then it started moving slow.It lit up brighter then shot across the hole sky in 2 seconds max.              its back...I got some footage, ill stay out all night every night this summer. im getting more footage soon . its around all the time. wish i could of filmed all the other things ive seen it do. but my camera is going to be ready. i think this is my calling.......Later for now.  5 -4 -11
content.summary: Bright round orb going slow ,filmed it finally .Not much footage  but got some

content.detailedDescription:
About 3 weeks ago out in tipton a buddy and i had saw this ufo so we stopped and pulled off to the side of the road to watch. it was a bright orange light with an aura i would say, shooting straight up, fast. then at a certain point it decided to take off to the left at a ridiculous speed. at that time it's light was going on and off. then it would shoot straight up again eventually vanishing into the sky. i never thought i'd see it again, but i was wrong. on my way home to dundee tonight i saw the same exact orange light shooting straight up. i couldn't believe it, right away i call my buddy to tell him. then i go to look at it but couldn't see it. so i look back at the road and there it is traveling at another high speed to the other side of dundee. that is when i happened to be driving through town and saw the group of people watching the same thing. i rushed home quickly to see it headed towards monroe. with the object shutting its light off finally. then out of nowhere comes either a plane or a jet (i believe jet) and starts to follow it. whatever the object was though quickly took off and disappeared. i'm just hoping to get some answers here. thanks! 

side notes: both times i was driving. what made me notice the object was looking in the sky which i tend to do a lot and saw it shooting straight up. when i first noticed i realized it was a ufo since never seeing anything like it. my feeling is shocked, surprised and wanting to know what it is.
content.summary: Ufo same one seen 3 weeks apart different countys in michigan.

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared from no where, was 1/4 size of moon and remained stationary for approximatly 3 mins. it was very low at an estimated elevation of 500 ft buts hard to say due to distance. it was in my best estimate over 3 miles away. extremely bright shifting from white light to red before blinking a very bright blue and dissappearing. am i crazy?
content.summary: Bright light sphere or diamond

content.detailedDescription: I was at bald head island nc for the weekend and witnessed 6 orange balls going slowly thru the sky and then dissappear at a certain spot.  there had been a power outage where i was staying and i went out on the deck to observe the stars and saw the orange objects in the sky moving slowly with no sound.  i couldn't tell how high they were.  the first two were in single file.  the second two were side by side and the other two were in single file.  when each got to a certain point in the sky they dissappeared.    several family members and friends witnessed the same thing.  the next night , sunday may 1 we went out at the same time and saw the same thing except all were in single file.  they dissappeared in the same place as they did the previous night.  i thought they might be helcopters but there was no sound and they vanished. we saw them april 30, and may 1, 2011 heading west.
content.summary: 6 orange orbs. single file 1 night / 2 side by side first night /4 in line

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing on lake wosley on manitoulin island from 1pm to 3pm today.  i caught no fish but decided to stop and take some photos on my way home.  i do this all the time and have taken 1000s of pics of this area.  when i got home, i started going through the day's photos and this image showed up.  my camera, a 5 mega pixel panasonic lumix was in the "photo burst" mode.  i took two images from the exact same spot.  in the first image, there is nothing...In the second image, there appears to be a disc over the lake.

i heard nothing...I saw nothing while i was out there.  i probably drove around the area for another half hour or so taking photos from other vanatage points.  when i was out, i noticed nothing unusual at all.

i've used my primitive software to zoom into the disc and it seems quite simply, a disc in the sky.

the thing that i find very interesting is the "photo burst" nature of the two pics i'm going to upload.  the first pic i'm uploading has nothing in it...Yet the second pic i'm uploading features this disc.  these images were captured less than a second apart.

i experience no "out of the ordinary" feelings of any kind.  it was a very uneventual day until i got home and reviewed my pics.
content.summary: Out taking pics...When i got home, i discovered an object i didn't see originally.

content.detailedDescription:
In my car driving on man-o-war in lexington (toward us68 from us27), my wife and i noticed a few white streaks in the sky. thinking at first they were jet trails, i began to be more curious when i noticed about 5 or 6 in different parts of the sky ... travelling at different trajectories. i also considered shooting stars or a meteor shower, but there don't appear to be any other reports (the lyrids were the week before). 

so, i couldn't explain it. i did manage to snap a picture of 3 of them. i lost sight of the objects when i went into orange leaf for some frozen yogurt and i didn't regain sight of them when i came back out. 

picture available at *(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Multiple white objects over lexington

content.detailedDescription:
I used to live in maryland from 1964 to 1977.  i guess it was about 1969 to maybe 1972--i don't remember the exact year when we seen a ufo. it was in the summer, i had been fishing with my brother-in-law "bo" (who is now deceased) it was in the evening as we were on our way home on dairy road near the town of rising sun.  i lived on dairy road and was only a couple of minutes from home when i spotted the ufo.  as we were going down the road there was a field on my left and across the field there were two hills seperated by a valley, as we were moving something caught my eye coming from the vally between the hills. i turned my head to the left and seen the front of the ufo moving about 3 feet of the ground and going about 1 mile per hour (just moving really slow) i told bo 'look at that".  i stopped in the road and we watched it move real slow compelety out into full view.  as we were setting there watching it move, all of a sudden it stopped and was about 3 feet off the ground.  i guess the size of it about 50 feet across and about 20 ft. high.  it was really big.  it made no sound and the color was a dirty silver. when it stopped i got the feeling that it didn't want to be seen.  when it stopped it set there about 3 seconds and than moved straight up about 20 feet and stopped again.  thats when i thought we may be in big trouble but at that moment when it stopped it was like a rocked blasting off, fire came from beneath it about 5 foot circle and still made no sound.  after it took off we only seen it for about 300 feet and it disappeared and was gone.  the distance from us was within 200 yards so we got a really good view of it.  there were no windows that i could see or any markings.  i would say the whole thing from start to finish took about 90 seconds. the thing that we were not able to figure out was it was evening when we seen the ufo and only lived a couple of minutes down the road but didn't get home till after dark. plus we never thought to tell anyone about it. we just forgot about it.
it was a strange experience.  i have seen many other ufo's but that one was up close.
content.summary: I seen a ufo up close

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:30 p.M. and i took a peek out the windown blinds. i noticed what i assumed might be a planet because it was brighter than any star i'd seen. so i walked outside to take a closer look. i watched for a minute, maybe two, when i started to see the light move. it moved to the left slowly, then it would go up quickly, down, then back to the right. the way it moved reminded me of the way a bee would hover and dart from place to place. as it moved it seemed to get brighter and i thought i saw different colored lights also. so i called my husband outside to have a look and tell me what he saw. he stated that he was, in fact, seeing the same thing. there was no sound whatsoever that night not even coming from the object. we watched the object for probably ten to fifteen more minutes and then my husband went inside and got his binoculars. i took a peek with the binoculars and saw the object pretty clearly. it was a round shape and seemed to have hundreds of lights all over it. the lights seemed whitish and bluish-purple at times. it just radiated. it would get brighter and seemed to pulsate and as it did so it seemed to change shape. i still believed maybe this could have been something military until then but when i looked through those binoculars i just broke out in a cold sweat and instantly felt sick. my husband and i took turns looking through the binoculars in disbelief at what we were seeing. it was a rather cool night but i was still soaked with perspiration and shaking to the point of hardly being able to stand. about an hour and a half after first seeing the first object, my husband noticed two more off to the right almost above our home. these objects all behaved in the same manner and appeared the same. we watched for almost two and a half hours before going back inside. my husband wanted to watch till the objects disappeared or did whatever they were going to do but i was terrified and made him stay inside and go to bed with me. this is our second encounter of this nature. back in february about 25 miles northeast of where we live we we're driving down the highway and approaching a small town and it wa just after dark. just above the treetops ahead i noticed a blue light that i assumed maybe was a tower of some sorts although i knew there hadn't been anything there ever. as i looked closer i noticed there were more blue lights, i would say three to four, and they were moving in an irregular triangular pattern just above the treetops. we watched this for about thirty seconds before the lights just disappeard. my husband and father also witnessed this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Myself and my husband witnessed what we assume to be ufo's on two different occasions.

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped outside onto my front steps havin' a smoke.It had been a quiet night,my family was settling in for the night when directly in front of me over the tree line this extremely bright object appeared,it was just all of a sudden there,(i was facing west towards greenlawn cemetary) and almost instantly it fell to the ground(?)but it didn't really "fall" so to speak it was more like it propelled itself directly towards the ground at freefall speed as if you were to hold a tennis ball in your hand and let it go. i could still see it through the tree line as it disappeard. imagine giving the ok sign with your hand that's how big it seemed (circle within thumb and index finger) when immediately after there seemed to be a flurry of movement of much smaller lights(specks if you will). and that was it.My immediate thought was a falling star and then almost as quick as i dismissed that, realizing it was a friday thought maybe fireworks from the jacksonville landing downtown,but when nothing followed i realized i had just truly witnessed something i couldn't explain. my son and i then headed for landon middle school where it was relatively dark and scanned the sky with binocs' but didn't see anything.To this date i have mapped a detailed line of sight of fields (5) within about 2.5 miles stretching from my home to the st.Johns river to check out.On a side note i would most certainly like to talk to the that other person here in jax who reported what they had seen that night mufon case #28861 feel free to share my email address with them if possible. also i did email wjxt (newsforjax.Com)that night for the record.
content.summary: Not quite a circle, bright white with a tinge of green encircling it.Sped at freefall speed towards the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing football in the intermerial feild on my school grounds with a couple buddies. i was bored and just looked away at the sky. i saw 3 white light streak torwards one another and once they met up there was a big flashed in a white line then they dissappeared. i quick started running and pointing in the sky so excite at whit i had just saw as i was already a firm believer in aliens
content.summary: I lpooked to the sky and say three lights one apppearde to look like  a tear drop leaving a red yellow color trail

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were star gazing in our backyard,which is near the outskirts of town.  we had our telescope set looking due west, when my brother told me to turn and look at the eastern sky (he was scanning the night sky).  we could see a glowing object slowly traversing the sky and is it got closer to us/line of view, it slowly started to fade out.  the entire sighting took a good 20-30 seconds from the time it was first spotted until it faded away.  interestingly enough, it did not disappear over the horizon.  it seemed to disappear quite a distance away from the horizon.  there were no blinking lights, no flashes of light, just a glowing object that slowly floated by and then faded away.  we were not scared, just felt like curious onlookers.
content.summary: Slowly travelling sphere of light which slowly dissapeared as it got closer to line of sight

content.detailedDescription: On may 1, my husband and i noticed 2 flashing lights in the western sky at about 1-2:00 position.  we could see some color and watched them about 30 minutes until they dipped below the horizon.  tonight, we watched them with a telescope.  they appeared just at dusk in the western sky at approximately the same position.  we could see them with the telescope.  the first one was circular in shape and had 2 rings of flashing lights.  they went from green/blue/white.  it reminded us of those "chasing" christmas lights.  the colors were very vivid, and we could definitely see two separate circles of lights - one inside the other.  it kept moving east-west, but we were able to capture it on video.  i couldn't find my tripod, but put my samsung point & shoot up to the eyepiece of the telescope and captured it that way.  it moved towards the horizon, as we kept having to move the telescope to see it.  the second one was more at the 12:00 -1:00 position in the west, and there was some broken clouds, but we did get to see that one in the telescope too.  this one flashed red/orange/yellow, and the lights were in 2 lines - both running east-west, and north-south on the object.  this also moved towards the horizon and seemed further away then the first one.  i did capture this one on video too, although it is not as clear as the first one.  this 2nd one moved faster too.  it also dipped below the horizon after about 30 minutes.  we live about 12 miles from the gulf of mexico and north of tampa.  two of our neighbors were here tonight and observed the objects too.  when i saw these on may 1, i checked on the internet to see if there was a satellite or something that could explain what these objects were.  i even checked the flight paths of aircraft - even though we both knew that there was no way these were aircraft.  they looked almost stationary, but with the telescope we could see how they moved tonight.  none of us have ever seen anything like these objects before.  i am attaching the video of the first object.  please note that you can't see anything until about a minute into the video.  we were setting up the telescope because the object had moved again.
content.summary: 2 ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription: Again tonite as i was walking home from the store i stopped to observe the skies. at which time i seen a very bright starlike object move across the sky. it could not have been more than 75-100 yards up. it was metallic, but the metal put off such a glow that it was almost hard to look at. just after passing under the big dipper a smaller not so bright object seemed to eject from the object and flew off in the opposite direction at a much greater speed than the large object. it was not a shooting star, as it didn't appear to be moving very fast. it took about 4 minutes from the time it entered my view to the point that i couldnt see it anymore.
content.summary: Bright starlike object moving north to south in western sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the night sky and saw a star close to the southern horizon. i ignored it at first because i thought it was a star. i realized quickly that it wasn't a star because of the intensity of the light as well as the slight flashing/pulsing of the light. as i watched the light, it would get dim and then very bright. it also seemed to sort of wiggle around in the sky. it finally disappeared all the way. after that, there were several flashes that appeared to come from behind the horizon.
content.summary: Star blinking, moving, and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving toward home on state hwy 12. disc shaped object appeared about 20 ft above a street light. sunroof was open & object hovered over and paced car for approximately 4/5 minutes then sped off to the ne toward the rogers airport. it made no sound, but seemed to produce a powerful vibration. it was larger than the car, but smaller than a house. it seemed to follow the car and at one point was only about 6 ft above the car. it did not affect the car's performance.
content.summary: Was driving west toward town, object appeared approx 20 ft above car. paced vehile for 4/5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
this event took place quickly and there are some doubts about what was actually seen as i was not able to view the objects for any length of time.
i speculate that i may have witnessed the running lights of two vehicles driving down a nearby foothill at night. the jury is still out! 
    i had gone for a long walk in my neighborhood of "the vistas" in sparks nevada. i was heading west down los altos pkwy. towards home.  shortly before 10pm. i looked behind me and saw what at first looked like a commercial jet swooping down at a low height near the east foothills. i would guess only a few blocks behind me and below 500 feet.  suddenly i saw a second object identical in configuration to the first move in behind the first. they weren't flying in formation but definitely traveling toegether. my impression is that the first "object" was in a bank and rolled itself level. i could clearly see what looked like running lights on the top and sides of the objects. two lights on top and one on each end of what looked like a saucer seen edge on. i say saucer, but i could not determine the exact shape in the dark. my impression was of large objects closer to 100ft.In length instead of say 30ft. i became very alarmed as i was by myself and exposed out in the open. i decided to "duck" into a side street where i could get another view of the objects and take cover if i needed to. i lost sight of the objects behind trees and homes. i resumed my walk home without further incident. 
     i checked the news for reports from other people but have found none so far. the capture of bin laden has dominated the news. i went back after dark to the same place monday may 2nd to see if maybe i had just seen cars coming down sierra summit road. i watched a few cars travel down hill in the dark but they did not look like what i saw sunday night. these "objects" seemingly appeared out of the hills and their large size, stealth and speed with which they maneuvered was startling.
content.summary: Possible brief nocturnal sighting of two unknown

content.detailedDescription: For the past two years or so me and my friend's go to star gaze at this spot on highway 88 near bear river.  and sense then have seen multiple ufo sightings. what is most common is a light coming up from the mountain very low on the ridge. it varies in color from a dim orange to super bright white almost blue sometimes.  it is hard to describe the shape as the object is about 2 miles away.  it's movments are unlike any conventional air craft.  it seems to hover low on the mountain side and can change diretion effortlessly.  my cousin and i once witnessed (our first sighting) a dim orange light appearing and disappearing on the ridge line, then it lit up very bright whitish blue, and stared moving very erraticly, almost like it couldn't stay still.  it also seemed to jump from one spot to another instantly like a quarter to half mile from where it was. from the research i've done on other peoples sightings and belief's the craft definetly seems to be using some sort of anti-gravity technology. after observing the first sighting for over 30 minutes we were a litle freaked out and left.  i wish i hadn't now i go back several times a month hoping to see it again.  althogh we do see unidentified light's almost every time we havent seen anything like the first sighting. usally it's one if not more light's moving along the ridge line at slower speed's but still very weird.  i wish i had a nice video cam to get it on tape.  but i would like to show this to someone if they are interested in an investigation or even seeing it themselves.  i'd love to show you the spot or answer any other questions you may have.
content.summary: Unexplained light(s) apearing and disapearing on mountain ridge

content.detailedDescription:
I was about to head to bed, i decided to go outside for a cigarette. i went to my front door and lit up. i looked up to the sky and saw what i believe was a ufo which hovered above downtown saskatoon. i couldn't get over how big it was. i took reference points from various places like trees and a condo unit that is 500 plus meters from my front door. my best estimate was that this ufo was at least 6 stories high and looked to me from the distance it appeared to be away from me to be at least a mile wide to two miles in length. i remember thinking how beautiful it was. the underside was extremely clear and my focus was on the designs that were underneath. they seemed to be mayan or even egyptian designs. with gold or silver trim and black fill the design looked to be some sort of maze. i looked to figure the size of this craft which filled the sky. my reference points were two trees and suggested this was at least a couple of miles wide and by the distance it seemed to be away from me (one mile) this craft was at least as tall as the condo block which it hovered over. it stretched from the condo block as far as my eye could see. then the ufo flew straight up to space. there was no noise, no recognizable power source it seemed more like some kind of anti gravity propulsion that took it away at an extremely high speed. i was fascinated to see whether the craft would have some heat trail as it left the atmosphere yet there was nothing it just disappeared into the stratosphere. 
the strangest thing for me was what happened after the event. i went into my house and immediately forgot i'd seen a ufo. it wasn't until two days later when i went out for a smoke at roughly the same time when i looked up to the sky and my brain clicked 'oh that was where the ufo was' then i nearly fell over in disbelief that i could forget even for a couple of days such an experience. i spent the next day going over in my mind what had really happened. maybe it didn't happen, maybe it was a dream, maybe i'd had some kind of memory wipe or something, after much deliberation i came to the conclusion that this was a real event, i then told my wife and posted on facebook, hoping someone else would have seen it. nothing came back, no sightings. i have an idea that this and many other ufo's use some kind of cloaking device or even mind manipulation to reduce sighting occurrences. i don't know all i do know is this craft was the most beautiful thing i'd ever seen.
content.summary: Ufo as big as a small city over downtown saskatoon

content.detailedDescription:
This incident happens almost every day here in lake co. it started a few weeks ago. these 'jet' planes that leave a smoky trail were starting to become more frequent as the days went by.Last sunday, these 'planes' would start early in the am and continue to fly over until dark. i can see for miles where i live and the entire sky is filled with trails of smoke. by evening the sky is so filled with this smoke that it might look like clouds to those who are not paying attention. there are days that it doesn't happen at all.
i am retired and spend alot of time walking. the first time i noticed how strange these planes were was when i noticed how one looked like a dark shadow. as i was watching it, it just disappeared! you could see evidence of this...A trail of smoke that just starts and stops randomly. at first i didn't know what it was until i saw it happen.
i have reported strange happenings in the past up here in hidden vlly. i pray that some day soon somebody will investigate up here again. 
also, has anybody noticed the 'star' like lights in the sky? i pointed them out to my family members but they think they are just stars. stars that are so close that they are in our atmosphere? hmmmm.....
content.summary: Strange jet

content.detailedDescription:
i had just gone to bed about 9 pm.  as i was lying there still awake i saw a flash of bright light through the window from the direction of our driveway.  i waited for a car door to open and close as i thought we had a unexpected guest, but no one had come. i called to my husband to see if anyone had come and he said no.
  a minute later i saw a strange light through the other bedroom window off in the distance.  i was watching it because it was doing very strange things.  it was making geometic type movements in the sky like circles, triangles, etc. we lived near an airport but this light was not behaving as an airplane would behave.
  i got out of bed and sat by the window to watch and called my husband in to see this.  as we sat there watching it it came closer to the house. now it appeared as a very bright white -yellowish light, almost too bright to look at.  at this point it was about 200 feet from the house hovering just above tree top level.  there was a lone tree in the field next to the house that enabled us to judge it's size and distance accurately. it appeared to be close to the tree and just above it. 
  as we sat there watching it it emitted a search light rotating around on the ground and the area as though it were looking for something. as the light came around it shown right into our bedroom window.  it made quite a number of rotations.  we looked at each other in disbelief. at this point we decided to run ouside to get a better look.
  it was cold and still, not even the slightest breeze.  i could hear the traffic from the highway which was a mile away.  the night sky was crystal clear. we lived in the country on a dead end road far from city lights.  we had a very clear veiw of the sky since we lived on the top of the highest hill the county. we often sat outside at night to look at the sky and watch the stars.
  the craft made no sound of any kind. i felt no moving air from it. if it had been a helicopter we would have been deafened by the noise and barraged with dust and air  from the propellers at that close range.
  as it hovered, it was getting less bright and we could make out more details of the craft. it was disk shaped with a higher area on the top. there were red lights or windows around the top part. as we watched it we could see more details. the red lights looked more like windows with a red light inside it like a dark room that photographers use.  i could see five or six silouhetted human like figures inside it moving around. some of them seemed to be looking at us as we looked at them.  the under side of the craft remained faintly glowing with the white yellow light.
  i would judge the size of the craft to be about 50 feet in diameter.  it would have fit into our driveway area between the house and the barn.
  it just hovered there like that for at least 20 minutes. 
  we could have walked right under it, but we didn't. it did not make any threatening movements or noises. i never felt any sense of danger.
  after about 20 minutes of watching it, another disk appeared from behind our house. it looked just like the first one. it was hovering moving very slow and close to the ground, below tree top level. the two of them hovered next to our house for several minutes then moved very slow down into the valley below tree level. they disapeared from our sight behind the trees in the valley. we didn't see them again.
  i was flabbergasted and elated at the same time with our experience.  i wanted to report it to someone, but who would  even believe us.  i had not heard of mufon yet. the next day i called the airport and spoke to an air traffic controller and asked them if they had seen anything on the radar that night.  the man told me he couldn't relate any information about what they see on the radar to the public, even if they saw something unusual he could not talk about it. his response was worded in a way that led me to beleive that they did indeed see something on the radar but could not disclose the information. 
  i did not report it to the police.  i didn't think they would write a report on it.
  even though i was reluctant to dicuss what we had seen with other people, over the next few days i broached the subject with 3 of our neighbors.
  the first was our landlord who lived next to us and i figured if he was awake he must have seen something that night.  he was not at all surprised at my story and said that he often saw ufo's in the valley over the years.  he had been living at that house all his life since it was a family farm that had been in the family for 3 generations.  he was 72 years old and was a good resource of information about anything local. he was a credable witness, but he said he didn't see anything that night.
  we did have a lengthy discussion about the ufo's he had seen in the past.  it was pretty much the same thing as we had seen, and he added that he had on several occasions found burn circles in the crops. 
   he said that most of the neighbors around there knew about the ufo's and were ok in talking about it. it was sort of a local rite of passage with new people moving into the area. all the old timers in the area were quite familiar with the phenomenon.
  another neighbor who i frequently went horseback riding with said that it hovered over their house for an hour late that night. they had previous experiences with the ufo's also.  
  the third person i talked to about it,was a friend who lived down the road.  they knew about the sightings, but were determined that they wanted nothing to do with it.  they were born again christians and seemed to be very threatened by the experiences.
  two years later we moved due to economic conditions.
  over the years i have talked about our experience with many different people. some are eager to relate their own ufo experience, most are skepticle.  i learned very quickly to use caution and to feel people out before relating the whole story to them.  many people still regard ufo experiences as bunk or ridicule it.
  it may not count for much relating this experience so many years after the fact, but it has always been in the back of my mind.  i always had a fascination with the idea of ufo's as a child growing up in the sixties.
  there were books and stories about it and i held a open minded interest in it as i became an adult.  i have always been glad that i had this experience because i know i am not crazy or hallucinating or making it up.
   i wish i had pictures but we didn't have a very good camera that night. i was too mezmerized by the experience to want to take a picture.  pictures would have been inconclusive any way. it would have shown the bright light but nothing else.
  i don't know if i can find too many people from that area to corraborate my story except for my husband.  we are now divorced but i do know where he lives and he does talk about the experience.
  we don't live at that address any more, but i have gone by there from time to time.
  it would not surprise me if there where still sightings in that area.
  the uniqueness of the geography of that area could be the reason for the sightings.  the location is the highest point in the county with a very large valley on the southern side.  the valley has no houses in it since it floods every spring.
  when we lived there we had many storms that produced unusual lightening effects. we where often surrounded by balls of lightening and such intense lightening i would not answer the phone during a storm because the lightening would travel through the lines and ring the phone during storms.  i have never experienced such intensity of lightening anywhere else. i was even struck by lightening in the house one day during a storm. thankfully it was not severe and did no lasting harm.
  i also believe that native american people who used to live there had a burial site there.  the neighbors found many artifacts there.  the area had unusual geography and history and i always felt that there was something different that set it apart from other places i have lived in. there are also high power lines that run over the top of that hill.
  the farm we lived on where we had the ufo experience was located on pleasant valley rd. near winchester ,wi. west of neenah.  we lived on the dead end of the road over looking the valley. it was a beautiful place to live back then.  i know that there have been subdivisions built in the area since then.  i don't know if the old farm is still there.  it was owned by leslie dobbie, who is now deceased. he was our next door landlord at the time.  the other neighbors names i have forgotten.
  i had many unusual dreams and clairvouant experiences while living at that address, but i never recalled any abduction experiences. 
   it was a life changing experience for both of us. since then, i have never viewed life or the world we live in with ambivilence.  it made me more aware of my planet and my place in the cosmos.
content.summary: Close encounter for 30 minutes,additional witnesses available.

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate and i were standing outside on our front porch around 10pm mid-april, and i saw something twinkling between the bare branches of a tree across the street.  i knew right away it wasn't a plane, because it did not have the red and green lights a plane does, and it wasn't moving at the steady speed of a plane.  i did notice that it was moving, however.  the air was still, no wind or breezes, so the tree branches were not swaying in any way, and the twinkling lights were gradually moving left from one branch to another, then up.  

i asked my roommate if he was seeing what i was seeing, and he confirmed that there was definitely something in the sky moving unlike a normal aircraft.  it was bright, and the lights were very defined (red, white, blue, purple, possibly orange) and the twinkling seemed to actually be the light rotating in a disk formation.  i looked more steadily at the object and realized that one set of lights was rotating horizontally; there was another set of lights moving vertically, and both were part of the same object.  it moved slowly, very slowly, and my roommate used this in comparison to the tree we were looking through to figure out how big the object actually was.  the sky was clear, however, so this was very difficult to determine.  he did see the rotation of the lights and again confirmed what i saw.

we debated on reporting this but considering it could be the international space station, we decided to leave it alone.  upon further research i discovered that the iss does not have rotating lights like the object we saw, and this stuck in my mind for the next few weeks.

last night we were outside again and both of us saw the exact same object in the sky, but significantly lower in its placement (not in the tree but above a coniferous bush-like tree that is approximately 4 feet shorter and 3 feet to the right) and not moving.  the lights were still rotating in the same pattern, and again it was a very clear night.  we are under the impression this object is in space, since on a cloudy night with even just wisps of clouds we haven't seen the object.
content.summary: Rotating lights in distance

content.detailedDescription:
i was best as i can recall a jr in high school and was going to a basketball game, it was dark but not late. i was on main st that runs parallel to hwy 11w i was stopped at  a 4 way stop. i was going to make a left to enter hwy 11w, this interchange is in alignment with an entrance to what was then called holston army ammunition plant, now bae, it makes high explosive for the military. so when i looked left to begin the turn a bright white light in the sky caught my eye,it was over the ammunition plant grounds, i thought it was a helicopter, then it dropped slightly and accelerated out of sight kinda going right at an angle like a check mark, that happened instantly. it was almost instantly gone. that made my jaw drop.  the way i remember the light was bright white like led are today, and was round looking. i didn't see a craft. the best thing i can think of to describe the maneuver is check mark shaped. the sight didn't scare me, i thought i just saw a ufo, i am an open minded person so that was pretty cool. 
   i know that wasn't much of a sighting, i hesitated to even mention it but as i listened to other descriptions of sightings over military interests, i realized that others had seen them at about the same time frame.
content.summary: I saw a bright white light over holston army ammunition plant,  then it shot off into space

content.detailedDescription: Around 6:30pm my kids came running in asking for the camera because they saw a ufo. (usually this is just a plane that they are seeing) i went out without my camera to see it. when i got out there it was just flying over the house. it seemed to have a black band around the middle.I am certain that it didn't have any wings. by the time i had gotten my camera it was pretty far away. it was hard to make it out against the hazy cloud cover. i did get two pictures. the first two are unedited and the last one has only been sharpened and colors enhanced. i would like to know if this is just a type of weather baloon drone or what. last summer we saw exactly the same thing flying in the same direction sw to ne but there were 3 of them flying close together in a straight line.
content.summary: Silver or white cigar shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor came by to say hi but said what the hell is that? it was around 8:40ish while i was watching the sj sharks hockey game in my garage. i looked over my roof line and towards morgan hill area were about 8 glowing orageish balls. this was 8:40ish pm and at first i thought they were flares but they were moving erratically. at first staying still then moving rapidly. this was cambrian area facing morgan hill. i saw them for several minutes. i googled the sighting and it looked very similar to other sightings shown; multiple round objects moving unnaturally. i am not saying they are not from this world but it was highly unnatural.
content.summary: Multiple orange circle formation over san jose ca

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:40 pm on may 2, 2011 looking into the southwest sky from st. petersburg, fl i saw an orange glow not to high in the night sky.  it was approximately 45 degrees high in the sky. moving to the northwest.  not much noise was emminating from the "object" just the slight sound of air friction. th bright orange glow appeared to be attached to an object that had no lights. the only sort of body that could be detected was perhaps the void in the center of the fireball.  however no object could be discerned.  i continued at an even clip until i lost sight of the fireball behind the treeline, it did not appear to be losing altitude.  the whole incident lasted approximately 2-3 minutes.  my best guess is it could have been a rocket.
content.summary: Fireball in the sky over st. petersburg florida

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on highway 85 near camden ave in san jose ca. i looked up and noticed a group of 8-10 white and slightly orangish lights. they resembled the size of a typical airplane lights you usually see in the night sky, and about the same average distance away, just a little brighter. at first i thought they were stars, but they were so unfamiliar and oddly clustered. there was a main sort of u shape formation the lights appeared to be in, with 2 lights at it's west flank that were moving slowly, and would sporadically flicker. my son who is 10 years old saw it as well. i was so confused, i didn't understand what i was seeing, it was incredible. we watched this happen for about 10 seconds, then in a blink of an eye, they disappeared.
content.summary: Unusual lights in the san jose night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my neighbor's front steps in charlotte, nc talking with him and saw an orange colored orb come up over the horizon in the night sky.  it was around 10:30 pm, and i didn't say anything to my friend at first because i thought it might be a distant plane.  but then another orb appeared behind the first one and i told my friend to look up.  we started watching and another one appeared and another one.  they moved very slow and steady. they were traveling approximately from the south to the north.  they looked like orange balls of light, like they were on fire.  i picked up my phone and called another neighbor and said come out in the yard right now.  he came out and the three of us witnessed a series of about 10-12 orbs following each other across the sky.  they made no noise at all.  it was really weird.  after awhile they seemed to get more distant and more dim.  it looked like they were burning out, one after the other, or disappearing.  after a few minutes there was a second series of four or five more that followed the same path.  i have never seen anything like that before.  i called a local television station and reported it.  they said no one else had called.  today i called and reported it to the charlotte observer.  the lady i spoke with said she had not received any other reports.  i feel frustrated because i know other people had to have seen what the three of us had seen.  these balls of light were floating very low in the sky, right over the city.  wish i had a video camera and could have recorded it.  the whole event lasted about ten minutes.  i hope other people will send in reports to document the same event we saw.
content.summary: Series of bright orange orbs traveled across night sky silently one after the other

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a very bright object descend directly down over an area near hogan rd on the eve of april 29th, right after 10pm. i was parked on town center pkwy facing the direction of beach blvd. i saw a large object, like an upside down cone with a bright yellow-white light go directly down over the cell towers. the object then disappeared behind trees, but then i noticed what i can only describe as a military plane or heli-craft that i have never seen in flight. it was circling the area where i last saw the object. i then tried to follow the craft and noticed a news van was also looking for the object. they soon gave up chase for no reason. i went to the site of the towers the next day and noticed it is also a group of satellites and communication for radio, tv, etc. the object i saw was not a lantern, as suggested by local news. it had to have a span larger than the aircraft i saw afterwards and was brightly lit object that lit up the sky and it descended directly down in a controlled fashion.
content.summary: Large teardrop shaped object descends directly over cell towers followed by military craft
